statements: SELECT * FROM game_data WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, player_name, points_awarded FROM game_data WHERE points_awarded > 50 ORDER BY points_awarded DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, event_name FROM game_data WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM game_data WHERE player_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(points_awarded) AS max_points, MIN(points_awarded) AS min_points FROM game_data;
SELECT * FROM game_data WHERE event_id = 1 ORDER BY event_date DESC, points_awarded ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT player_name, SUM(points_awarded) AS total_points FROM game_data GROUP BY player_name HAVING total_points > 100 ORDER BY total_points DESC
SELECT event_name, event_date, player_name FROM game_data WHERE points_awarded >= 50 AND event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT MAX(points_awarded) AS max_points, MIN(points_awarded) AS min_points, AVG(points_awarded) AS avg_points FROM game_data
SELECT DISTINCT player_name FROM game_data ORDER BY player_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_id, event_type FROM game_events WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT player_id, event_timestamp FROM game_events WHERE event_type = 'win' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE player_id = 10 ORDER BY reward_points DESC;
SELECT player_id, reward_type, reward_points FROM rewards WHERE reward_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE player_id = 123 ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM game_events WHERE event_type = 'level_up' AND player_id = 456;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM game_events GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_events > 10;
SELECT player_id, SUM(reward_points) AS total_points FROM rewards GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_points DESC;

SELECT player_id, event_count, reward_points FROM (SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS event_count FROM game_events GROUP BY player_id) AS A JOIN (SELECT player_id, SUM(reward_points) AS reward_points FROM rewards GROUP BY player_id) AS B ON A.player_id = B.player_id;
SELECT * FROM game_event_logs;
SELECT event_name, event_time FROM game_event_logs WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS event_count FROM game_event_logs GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points FROM rewards WHERE redeemed = TRUE;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type FROM player_interactions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_event_logs WHERE player_id = 100 ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_time FROM game_event_logs WHERE event_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY event_time ASC;
SELECT COUNT(player_id) AS total_players, AVG(reward_points) AS avg_points FROM rewards WHERE redeemed = TRUE;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type LIKE 'login%' AND player_id IN (SELECT player_id FROM rewards WHERE reward_points > 100);
SELECT MAX(reward_points) AS max_points, MIN(reward_points) AS min_points, SUM(reward_points) AS total_points FROM rewards WHERE player_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM game_event_logs ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_id, event_type FROM game_event_logs WHERE player_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE reward_name = 'Bonus Points';
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player_info WHERE player_level > 20;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type FROM player_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM game_event_logs WHERE player_id = 1 ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_info WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT reward_name, reward_value FROM rewards WHERE reward_value >= 100 ORDER BY reward_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'login' AND player_id = 3;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player_info WHERE player_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT * FROM game_event_logs WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, event_name FROM game_event_logs WHERE player_id = 10;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM game_event_logs WHERE event_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM game_event_logs WHERE player_id = 5 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, player_id, event_name FROM game_event_logs WHERE player_id = 3 AND event_date > '2022-01-15';
SELECT event_id, player_id, event_name, event_date FROM game_event_logs WHERE player_id = 1 ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT player_id, event_name FROM game_event_logs WHERE event_name LIKE '%win%'
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM game_event_logs WHERE event_name = 'Level Completed' AND player_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM game_event_logs WHERE player_id = 2 ORDER BY event_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT player_id, COUNT(event_id) AS total_events FROM game_event_logs GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_events >= 3 ORDER BY total_events DESC
